attributes.action: increase the national speed limits on major trunk routes ie motorways and dual carrageways to 100 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All motor vehicles produced now are more that capable of stopping from a raised speed limit within the distace quoted in the highway code for 70 mph ( which was drafted when vehicles still used drum brakes!) If he is worried about the lack of ability of road users, then increase the standards of the test, reducing road user numbers and accidents in one!
